alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 14 at 3:06AM MDT until March 15 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 MPH with gusts up to 65 MPH possible. * WHERE...Converse County Lower Elevations including Douglas and Glenrock. * WHEN...From late Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Watch means there is the potential for a hazardous high wind event. Sustained winds of at least 40 mph, or gusts of 58 mph or stronger may occur. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.
